channel.title: Home?
channel.description:
This is begining to piss me off so before I go crazy i'll ask for help :p
1) I'm basiclly trying to change the home cords.... Although unlike many sources my v2 will be based on delta... 2) I havn't worked much with delta before so i'm in need of help 3) If you know how to change the home cords please tell me...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-THANK YOU!-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“loggedout, post:11, topic:239374”]instead of me makin a new topic i wud rather bump this 1,
i got a problem how do i move the login from fally park to edge ive changed all the coords which are 2999 which is the fally park xcoord,

but that makes it so wen you die you go to edge and so on and i also edited the teleport to edge but
still cant login at edge on a new character

please help!?!?!?!?!?!?[/quote]

If you’d rather bump this, then you might as well get the hell off.

Read full topic

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @loggedout loggedout
item.description:
@loggedout wrote:

instead of me makin a new topic i wud rather bump this 1,
i got a problem how do i move the login from fally park to edge ive changed all the coords which are 2999 which is the fally park xcoord,

but that makes it so wen you die you go to edge and so on and i also edited the teleport to edge but
still cant login at edge on a new character

please help!?!?!?!?!?!?

Read full topic

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @Tai1 Tai`
item.description:
@Tai1 wrote:

Hey bro, had this problem to, go to playerhandler, or player.java and search for ‘initial x’ and that should be where it’s at.

Read full topic

The thing is there is multiple tele cords…

@tonypker13 wrote:

That would be in the Client or Player class then.

Read full topic

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @God3 God®
item.description:
@God3 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:6, topic:239374”][quote author=God® link=topic=315674.msg2507806#msg2507806 date=1225084708]

You should try logging into your server to wherever you start when you login. There should be a code for example: ::coords ::mypos something like that, look for it in client.java then type the code and then search the coordinates you get in client.java

I’ll try that, also Tony, the tele…
[/quote]
Client.java
Search for-"home"
Include the quotations. You’ll see this.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("You have been set upon by a Tele-Block."); // made by Tony. } else { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }
Change the XXXX and YYYY to the X and Y coords.[/quote]
… there is no home commands in delta base?

Read full topic

item.title: Home?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“God®, post:4, topic:239374”][quote author=`Rune-Dayz link=topic=315674.msg2507804#msg2507804 date=1225084653]
You should try logging into your server to wherever you start when you login. There should be a code for example: ::coords ::mypos something like that, look for it in client.java then type the code and then search the coordinates you get in client.java
[/quote]
I’ll try that, also Tony, the tele…[/quote]
Client.java
Search for-"home"
Include the quotations. You’ll see this.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("You have been set upon by a Tele-Block."); // made by Tony. } else { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }
Change the XXXX and YYYY to the X and Y coords.

Read full topic

You should try logging into your server to wherever you start when you login. There should be a code for example: ::coords ::mypos something like that, look for it in client.java then type the code and then search the coordinates you get in client.java
